column4: Hi. I need some help to setup gettext translation for a python script: https://launchpad.net/localhost-indicator
There is not much to translate (see GUI: http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Localhost-indicator_-_on_French_Ubuntu.png) but I don't manage to setup the gettext system.
Do you know a better channel to get help on translating an Ubuntu app?
